name: earnings-call-transcript-search
description: Fast, modern web application to fetch, store, and search earnings call transcripts

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.type-check: cd backend && npm run type-check && cd ../frontend && npm run type-check
